item.title: Done Criteria
item.author: tim@backgroundprocess.com (Tim Kuhlman)
item.description: A checklist list of done criteria is helpful to avoid skipping any steps in code creation, this is the list I use for my projects. Where possible automated tools should be used to help verify good practices are followed. These tools are typically language specific so I skipped adding any here.
